mapper.update: update t_table_info set tftitle = #{tftitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tfbegintime = #{tfbegintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tfendtime = #{tfendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tfsrc = #{tfsrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tfflag = #{tfflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tfcreator = #{tfcreator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tfkeys = #{tfkeys,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tfcondition = #{tfcondition,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where tfid = #{tfid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select tfid, tftitle, tfbegintime, tfendtime, tfsrc, tfflag, tfcreator, tfkeys, tfcondition from t_table_info
